Shortcuts: Control + O Open a file Control + Q Exit the program Control + V View the playlist Control + P open previous media of the playlist Control + N open next media of the playlist Control + M Mute audio Control + S Take Snapshoot Control + L Repeat On/Off Control + R Randomize playlist F11 Toggle fullscreen F1 Show help
Arrow Up volume up Arrow Down volume down Arrow Left Backward the media by 10 sec Arrow Right Forward the media by 10 sec Space Play/Pause
